papers.title: An airline employee crashes an airliner in Seattle

papers.title: Donald Trump has thrown the Turkish lira under the bus

papers.title: Europe’s top clubs were underpaid for their World Cup stars
papers.desc: Ten teams provided nearly half of the talent, yet received a fifth of the compensation

papers.title: The Academy announces a misguided new category

papers.title: Neo-paganism offers something old and something new
papers.desc: Attempts to recreate the nature-loving worship of old are gaining popularity even if they are based on guesses

papers.title: Black Lives Matter is not a terrorist organisation
papers.desc: It is pulling back the curtain on injustice and despicable deeds, says co-founder Alicia Garza
